entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is defending Harry in the Wizengamot.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: The Minister of Magic, who is present at the Wizengamot and seems to be incensed by Dumbledore's words.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, who has been charged with a specific offense in the Wizengamot.

entities.name: wizengamot
entities.description: A group of wizards and witches that serves as a court to try magical crimes.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is defending Harry in the Wizengamot, stating that there is no law to punish him for every bit of magic he has ever performed.
Fudge seems to be disapproving of Dumbledore's words in the Wizengamot.
Harry has been charged with a specific offense in the Wizengamot.
